Definition at line 73 of file Eval_Source_C_PolyMAC_Elem.h.

References la_source_constituant, Evaluateur_Source_PolyMAC_Elem::porosite_vol, DoubleVect::size(), source_constituant, sub_type, Deriv_Champ_Don_base::valeur(), Ref_Champ_Don::valeur(), and Evaluateur_Source_PolyMAC_Elem::volumes.

{
  int size=source.size();
  if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,la_source_constituant.valeur().valeur()))
    for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
      source(i) = source_constituant(0,i)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
  else
    for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
      source(i) = source_constituant(num_elem,i)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
}
double Eval_Source_C_PolyMAC_Elem::calculer_terme_source ( int  num_elem) const [inline, virtual]

Implements Evaluateur_Source_PolyMAC.

Definition at line 63 of file Eval_Source_C_PolyMAC_Elem.h.

References la_source_constituant, DoubleTab::nb_dim(), Evaluateur_Source_PolyMAC_Elem::porosite_vol, source_constituant, sub_type, Deriv_Champ_Don_base::valeur(), Ref_Champ_Don::valeur(), and Evaluateur_Source_PolyMAC_Elem::volumes.

{
  if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,la_source_constituant.valeur().valeur()))
    return source_constituant(0,0)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
  else if (source_constituant.nb_dim()==2)
    return source_constituant(num_elem,0)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
  else
    return source_constituant(num_elem)*volumes(num_elem)*porosite_vol(num_elem);
}
